description: FSM modeling the interactive states of the LinkedList example page that renders a <ul id="list">. The page has no explicit buttons in the HTML; interactions are inferred around the #list element (clicks, mutations) and page/script load.
notes: Only interactive DOM element present in the HTML is the UL with id="list" (#list). Triggers map events to selectors actually present in the provided HTML (body, #list, script[src='scripts.js'], link and h1 exist but are not used as triggers here). The FSM models clicks on the list and content changes (populated/cleared/updated) which would be emitted by the page script.
